description:
Giorno passes the test to join Passione and meets Bucciarati`s subordinates, Leone Abbacchio, Guido Mista, Narancia Ghirga, and Pannacotta Fugo. After welcoming Giorno into the team, they all head to Capri to retreive Polpo`s hidden fortune. Meanwhile, other members of Passione hear about the fortune and also go to look for it.
Source: crunchyroll
